resources.string: \"No woman has to be a victim of physical abuse. Women have to feel like they are alone.\"

Please follow the below steps to setup your account:


-Register Yourself.
-Register Your Guardian's Numbers.
-Always maintain working internet connection.
-SHAKE your phone in case of emergency to alert your guardians.
-You can also use the fake call and play police alarm features.
-Record audio for 30secs and then send to your guardians in a one click.
	



	LETS START NOW!
